thread.title_full: Gareth Bale sole British player on FIFA Ballon d'Or shortlist - Bournemouth Echo - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Bournemouth Echo
title: Gareth Bale sole British player on FIFA Ballon d'Or shortlist - Bournemouth Echo
text:
Wales winger Gareth Bale is the only British player included in FIFA's 23-man Ballon d'Or shortlist for the third successive year. Bale is one of 11 players from Spain's Primera Division to make the list, with the Premier League and Bundesliga each contributing five.
 Bournemouth Echo.
